hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select DISTINCT EODP.EODP_ID, EODP.REC_STATUS, EODP.ORG_ID, EODP.EODP_CODE, EODP.CREATOR, EODP.CREATE_TIME, EODP.MODIFIER, EODP.MODIFY_TIME, EODP.REC_VER, EODP.EODP_NAME_EN, EODP.EODP_NAME, EODP.EODP_CUSTOMER_CODE, EODP.EODP_CUSTOMER_NAME, EODP.EODP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EODP.EODP_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EODP.EODP_TRANSPORT_TYPE_CODE, EODP.EODP_TRANSPORT_TYPE_NAME, EODP.EODP_PRIORITY, EODP.TIME_ZONE, EODP.PM_CODE, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_CREATOR_NAME, ESUSM.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_MODIFIER_NAME, EODP.EODP_REMARK from EO_DIVIDE_STOCK_PARAM EODP LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EODP.CREATOR = ESUS.ESUS_ID LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUSM ON EODP.MODIFIER = ESUSM.ESUS_ID where 1=1 <<AND EODP.ORG_ID=:orgId>> <<and EODP.EODP_CODE like :eodpCode >> <<and EODP.EODP_NAME like :eodpName >> <<and EODP.EODP_NAME_EN like :eodpNameEn >> <<and EODP.EODP_CUSTOMER_CODE = :eodpCustomerCode >> <<and EODP.EODP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE = :eodpOrderTypeCode >> <<and EODP.EODP_TRANSPORT_TYPE_CODE = :eodpTransportTypeCode >> <<and EODP.EODP_REMARK like :eodpRemark >> <<and EODP.REC_STATUS = :recStatus >> <<and EODP.EODP_PRIORITY = :eodpPriority >>
order by EODP.EODP_PRIORITY asc
